description: System-generated unique identifier for this service pattern row.
Date-time the row was written or last updated, in compact yyyymmddhhmmssmmm format; exact event semantics may vary; confirm with SME.
Foreign key identifying the preventive maintenance schedule this pattern belongs to.
Metadata indicating the reference target used to resolve the schedule foreign key (likely the PM schedule entity); confirm with SME.
Foreign key identifying the service task or PM category included in this pattern.
Metadata indicating the reference target for the task/category foreign key (likely the PM category entity); confirm with SME.
Execution order of the task within the pattern; supports decimals to insert steps between whole numbers.
Original identifier from the legacy source system for lineage, reconciliation, and back-referencing.
Name of the legacy source table the record originated from.
